title: CBIC Issues Advisory on Central Excise Declaration Filing Procedure (Advisory No. 03/2026)
content:
# CBIC Issues Advisory on Central Excise Declaration Filing Procedure (Advisory No. 03/2026)

Ek important update hai! Government ne Central Excise Declaration Filing Procedure ke liye ek naya advisory announce kiya hai.

CBIC ne **Advisory No. 03/2026 dated February 05, 2026** jari ki hai, jismein Central Excise taxpayers ke liye declaration filing process ko detail kiya gaya hai.

*   **Who needs to file:** This advisory is specifically for manufacturers of notified goods such as Chewing Tobacco, Jarda Scented Tobacco, and Gutkha. These goods are notified under sub-section (1) of section 3A of the Central Excise Act, 1944.
*   **Form to be filed:** Manufacturers are required to file a declaration in **FORM CE DEC-01**.
*   **Due Date:** The declaration must be filed on or before the **7th day of February 2026**, or within seven days from the date of commencement of manufacturing of these notified goods.
*   **Filing Portal:** The filing is to be done on the existing **cbic-gst.gov.in** portal. The advisory also includes a step-by-step procedure with screenshots in Annexure-A for filing this initial declaration.
*   **Future Updates:** Similar advisories for filing CE PMT-01 (Monthly Payment Statement) and fresh declarations for changes in production factors or machine installations will be issued shortly.
